subject: Boxing
Cable Television
Copyrights and Copyright Violations
Television
Mobile Applications
lead_paragraph: Users taking advantage of the live-streaming app Periscope to watch the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight saved themselves about $100 and sent a potentially worrisome signal to rights holders.
